title: 130. How Knowing Your Astrology Deepens Your Self-Love
itunes:title: How Knowing Your Astrology Deepens Your Self-Love
description:
In this episode of the Self Love Fix podcast, we’re discussing astrology and how it can deepen the love and compassion we have for ourselves. 

Astrology is so meaningful when it comes to understanding ourselves better and peeling back the layers of how we express ourselves. 

In this episode we cover:

  • Embracing Astrology 
  • Moon Signs
  • Sun Signs
  • Rising Signs

These are just some of the astrology topics that you can discover and explore, but this is a great way to dip your toe in the water of this world.

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

 

CONNECT WITH BEATRICE:

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/theselflovefix 

Website: http://www.beatricekamau.com 

 

EPISODE RESOURCES:

To sign up for the masterclass at 50% off by November 5, 2021 11:59 pm PST use code "IAMMAGNETIC" at checkout at https://beatricekamau.com/oym 

Astrology app: CHANI app: https://chaninicholas.com/chani-app/

Best Astrology Book for Beginners-Intermediate: Astrology for Life by Nina Khan: https://amzn.to/2YZg9OO

Best Astrology Book for those who want to learn how to read birth charts: Llewellyn's Complete Book of Astrology: https://amzn.to/3BTQTI8

Website where you can find your birth-chart: https://cafeastrology.com/
